translated: Filled with various kinds of dirt,
a great lump, a great sore.
stuck with a pit of feces,
by the coming together of many things,
Always on the way to death,
in the presence of the king of death,
a man goes wherever he wants.
The body is covered by ignorance,
the body is submerged in the flood,
arisen from the net of latent tendencies.
followed by the root of craving,
covered by the concealment of delusion.
driven by the machine of kamma,
And when prosperity turns to adversity,
